item.title: Venmo gaining ground in payments as Cash App struggles
item.description: Earnings from PayPal and Block revealed diverging paths in peer-to-peer payments, with Venmo accelerating and Cash App losing steam.

item.title: Block shares plunge 18% as company takes 'cautious stance,' issues weak guidance for year
item.description: Block reported weaker-than-expected revenue for the first quarter.

item.title: Block plunges 20% as Cash App miss triggers downgrades
item.description: Analysts flagged fresh concerns around stagnant Cash App user growth, muted consumer demand and a soft macro environment that may weigh on monetizatio...

item.title: Industrial stock tied to the AI boom reports strong quarter. We like it, for now
item.description: Has Eaton's stock peaked? That's the big question for us.

item.title: Here are our biggest winners and losers from Wall Street's stellar week
item.description: Every weekday, the Investing Club releases the Homestretch; an actionable afternoon update just in time for the last hour of trading.
